sentences.english: Bearings allow the shaft to turn while permitting the housing to remain still.
sentences.chinese: 軸承允許傳動軸轉動的同時允許殼體保持靜止。

sentences.english: Captured with black and white film, her photography emulates the style of a cinematographer.
sentences.chinese: 黑白膠片同時也模擬着舞臺人生。

sentences.english: He was also a reckless adventurer who got lucky.
sentences.chinese: 同時他也是一位輕率魯莽而運氣十足的冒險家。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, there are more than 70 Chinese-funded businesses in Brazil and 300 Brazilian-funded businesses in China.
sentences.chinese: 同時，中國在巴西投資興建了70多家企業。

sentences.english: It also reflects the pantheistic experimentation of the period immediately following the Civil War.
sentences.chinese: 同時也反映出了泛神論時期緊跟的內戰時期狀態。

sentences.english: At the same time, the use of coal exhaustive method to optimize selection.
sentences.chinese: 同時利用窮舉法對配煤進行優化選取。

sentences.english: At the same time, Shafei has the devil character to save herself .
sentences.chinese: 同時，莎菲又有自救反抗的魔性。

sentences.english: The volatile substance contained a little of sesquiterpenes and diterpenoids.
sentences.chinese: 同時含有少量倍半萜和二萜類物質。

sentences.english: While she could be strict, she could also be a real “softie.
sentences.chinese: 她既有嚴厲的一面，同時也真的是一個感性的人。

sentences.english: He also became embroiled in controversy surrounding the government bail-out of Chrysler.
sentences.chinese: 同時他也因政府保釋克萊斯勒而被捲入巨大爭議。

sentences.english: The clever thing was to break the rules and stay alive all the same .
sentences.chinese: 聰明的做法，是把規矩破得巧，同時又得活得好。

sentences.english: So, apps such as Pandora internet radio can be listened to while reading the news using another app.
sentences.chinese: 例如你在閱讀新聞的時候同時收聽潘朵拉網絡廣播。

sentences.english: Unemployment and unfilled vacancies can exist side by side .
sentences.chinese: 失業和未填補的空額可以同時並存。

sentences.english: The effect of atomizing is better and burning is more full by improving nozzle structure inside and outside.
sentences.chinese: 同時改進燒嘴結構，使霧化效果更好，燃燒更加完全。

sentences.english: The equipartition law of energy is also briefly demonstrated.
sentences.chinese: 同時，對能均分原理也作了簡潔的論證。

sentences.english: The loss of tin in the sulphide copper concentrate was less than 4%.
sentences.chinese: 同時錫在銅精礦中的損失也不到4%。

definition: not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be
to be capable of/to be able to/can
to yield/to permit/to let sb do sth/to have sb do sth/to make sb (feel sad etc)/by (indicates the agent in a passive clause, like 被[bei4])
by means of/through/via/to pass through/to get through/to adopt/to pass (a bill or inspection etc)/to switch over
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
